item.title: oCIS and Containers
item.description: Cloud Native Why do we recommend to work with containers? Lightweight Containers are more lightweight than VMs. It is easier to work with shared volumes and networks because they are isolated from the host system. Dependencies The container images have all dependencies installed and the maintainer takes care for keeping them up-to-date. Scaling In addition to that, containers help with scaling.
